pullRequest.body:
... along with the `Nat`-specialised versions. Also add a few simple lemmas about `div` and `dvd`, restore `Nat.mul_div_mul_comm` and fix the name `AddGroup.toHasOrderedSub` to `AddGroup.toOrderedSub`.

From LeanCamCombi

---
